response.overview: In 1919, Australian farmer Joshua Connor travels to Turkey to discover the fate of his three sons, reported missing in action. Holding on to hope, Joshua must travel across the war-torn landscape to find the truth and his own peace.
response.tagline: To honour a promise. To find his sons. To make his peace.
response.title: The Water Diviner
